instructions.instruction: Measure the weight of the metal thermos.
Move the thermos to the right part of the table.
Measure the weight of all transparent wine glasses.
Clean the left part of the table from glass wine glasses.
Pick up the heaviest of wine glasses.
Move the lightest of glass wine glasses to the right part of the table.
Stack the transparent glass on the metal object.
What is the weight of the black object?
Move the transparent glass to the left part of the table.
Stack the transparent glass on top of the white object.
Measure the weight of the transparent glass.
Place the transparent glass on the left part of the table.
Stack the transparent glass on the plastic bowl on top of the brown object.
Place the plastic bowl on the plastic food box.
What is the weight of the cyan bowl?
Move the transparent object to the right part of the table.
Place the glass on top of the ceramic bowl on the plastic food box.
Stack the ceramic object on top of the white food box.
Measure the weight of the plastic glass.
Place the white, ceramic object on the right part of the table.
Pick up the lightest of all ceramic mugs.
Measure the weight of mugs.
What is the weight of the glass glass?
Move the lightest of all ceramic mugs to the right part of the table.
Clean the right part of the table from all mugs.
Place the glass glass on the right part of the table.
Pick up the heaviest of all glass objects.
Measure the weight of transparent glasses.
Measure the weight of the wine glass.
Place the heaviest of transparent objects on the left part of the table.
Remove transparent, glass objects from the left part of the table.
Move the wine glass to the left part of the table.
Pick up the lightest of transparent objects.
Place the heaviest of glasses on the wooden chopping board.
Measure the weight of glasses.
What is the weight of the wine glass?
Place the lightest of all transparent objects on the left part of the table.
Move the glass wine glass to the right part of the table.
Stack the green object on the purple object.
What is the weight of the plastic glass?
Move the green, plastic object to the right part of the table.
Pick up the heaviest of all mugs.
Stack the heaviest of all ceramic mugs on the ceramic plate.
Place the black, ceramic object on the ceramic bowl on the white plate.
Stack the brown, ceramic object on top of the bowl.
Measure the weight of all mugs.
Measure the weight of the brown object.
Remove all ceramic mugs from the left part of the table.
Place the heaviest of all mugs on the right part of the table.
Move the bowl to the left part of the table.
